title: sartorial sundays 10
text:
April 15, 2013Sartorial Sundays	

				
			Leave a comment		
	
			

	
		
			Sartorial Sundays #10
		
		We had no Wooster wednesday this week.
And I, as always am late with my Sartorial Sunday post.
So, I bring you a little sartorial treat for the eyes.
Imagine getting 25 of the mosty stylish men in fashion, and sitting down to lunch with them, just for a chat. What you get is a lot of bold patterns, a lot of ‘european socks’Â and bad rendition of Frank Sinatra’s “My Way”.
No advice or tips to give on this one, I think its something we can just enjoy together.
                                 

Okay. Stay Fancy.
